name: MergEvo TD
description:
Summon the lovely Merge Elves to repel the dark spirits and protect your hero!

60 kinds of Merge Elves with different abilities can be collected.
14 worlds, 500 different levels.
4 game modes, various enemies.
Many battle strategies and sometimes need a little luck.

Come to play a Funny and Relaxed game in the World of Merge and Evolution!
